name: The lost Village (itch)
description: The protagonist comes to this mountain village alone, but he still finds precious things that remain, the strong emotions that cannot be erased, the memories that belong to them alone, and the courage and wisdom of human beings that can never be erased in the face of unknown things. In the game, the main characters will slowly integrate the children's memory fragments, obtain their magical items to face the village ghosts and unknown forces, help them realize their wishes, and finally uncover the ultimate riddle of the village, to celebrate the courage of mankind.
